ygData.subject: Re: Weapon prices and locations
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know the whips are from Najema not Befallen. If you like axes go get 2 dwarven axes or 2 tomahawks.  I am pretty sure all the gem stone weapons are
ygData.messageBody:
As far as I know the whips are from Najema not Befallen.

If you like axes go get 2 dwarven axes or 2 tomahawks. I am pretty sure all
the gem stone weapons are ranger/druid only.

I personally will not use a whip as I dont believe it is a true warriors
weapon (unless maybe a female warrior), IMHO ;)

Jaade,
Indigo Sista Soldier.



> ----------
> From: CAB[SMTP:Bash@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 1:04 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Weapon prices and locations
>
> From: CAB <Bash@...>
>
> Barb Warrior looking up at 20th from close range, looking to upgrade
> dualign weapons. Got a pair of mino axes, which are nice, but heavy and
> slow. Seen the stats on the Barbed Leather Whip and it looks perfect.
> I know it's from befallen, but most likely in an area I can not get to.
> Is it possible to find these weapons for sale inside this zone by higher
> levels just selling off there loot for weight? If so what is a fair
> price for one? Also what are some other good dualing weapons? heard of a
> crystaline sword that sounds just sweet, but no idea where that one
> comes from.
>
> Bashlor the Big Dumb Barb Warrior of Bertox
